description: Alter surface fluxes to impose model climatology plus a 12-month running mean anomalies of Sea Surface Temperature (SST) over the sub tropical North Atlantic (10N-35N).   SST anomalies (1950-2014) will be provided by DCPP.  For groups that are unable to restore SSTs.
name: Impose SST running mean sub tropical N Atlantic
rationale: To investigate the role of sub tropical north Atlantic sea surface temperatures in the modulation of global surface temperature trends and in driving regional climate variations.
longName: Impose 12-month running mean of SST in the sub tropical north Atlantic
keywords: DCPP, SST, imposed, running mean, sub tropical north Atlantic
